This is an open-source project, and I can't demand people translate

title: Re-enable full proguard optimization.
message:
Re-enable full proguard optimization.

This is required to actually strip out log v/d calls, and the benefits
(smaller apk, fewer logs, more efficient background service) outweigh
the penalty of needing to store the mapping file.

Min/max values are now based on m/s and are converted at
runtime for different units. Closes #11.

Fix default preferences & add units.

Now there is no need to have the defaults in two places.
Not sure how I didn't find this solution before.

Units are now present as well; these will be customized for

It builds & runs successfully.

Also excluding the Android Studio project from this commit as

be fixed when I reorganize project build files.

title: Remove ActionBarSherlock and bring up to API 17.
message:
Remove ActionBarSherlock and bring up to API 17.

Haven't tested on API 10 or others yet, as Eclipse is being stubborn.
Pretty sure the action bar stuff will crash, which I'll address after
getting this all set up with Gradle.

title: Revert "Migrate to Maven."
message:
Revert "Migrate to Maven."

This was never well thought out. I'm going to give Gradle a go
next, since it's officially supported by the upcoming Android Studio.

Still stripping out ABS; going to just use native components instead.

This reverts commit 65421ae14dc6e8f6c340bbeef6b6ad1bd7317726.

title: Migrate to Maven.
message:
Migrate to Maven.

This will make the build a lot cleaner in the long run.

Still TODO:
* Sign/proguard/zipalign the release APK
* Sign the debug APK (?)
* Sync POM with AndroidManifest
* Update README with new build instructions.

title: Keep line numbers in binary.
message:
Keep line numbers in binary.

This will make issues such as the previous commit much easier
to debug in the future.

title: Fix a crash on startup with intents.
message:
Fix a crash on startup with intents.

Turns out the system will just return null if a sticky intent
hasn't been fired yet. :/

title: Forgot to add music player intents to the manifest.
message: Forgot to add music player intents to the manifest.

title: Replace activation mechanism.
message:
Replace activation mechanism.

This one is much more accurate and doesn't spiral out into a bunch of
conditionals. Every time there is an event (bt/headset/power) we check
if we should be running and just match that, instead of trying to handle
each event separately.

Fixes #7.

title: Add five more music players.
message:
Add five more music players.

HTC, Samsung, Winamp included, along with any player that sends
Last.fm or SLS intents.

title: Finish the about activity.
message: Finish the about activity.

title: Add an incomplete About dialog.
message: Add an incomplete About dialog.

title: Lazily update song meta.
message:
Lazily update song meta.

This means we don't have to hit the database whenever a song changes
(and the service isn't running) and we don't have to fetch on every
location update either.

title: Add a distance-based rate limiter to tracker.
message: Add a distance-based rate limiter to tracker.

title: Fix a missed cursor close.
message: Fix a missed cursor close.

title: Fix a crash when no location providers are available.
message:
Fix a crash when no location providers are available.

Not much we can do but show a message to turn one on.

title: i18n support.
message:
i18n support.

This was much easier than expected. Extracted some strings out into
an en_US locale, as they could convey different meanings in other
languages.

Translate here:
https://www.transifex.com/projects/p/speedofsound/

title: Improve the volume smoothing algorithm.
message:
Improve the volume smoothing algorithm.

It is now much more uniform across devices where the maximum volume
differs, as it operates on percentages instead of volume counts.

The update rate has been increased (and approach rate adjusted) for
smoother adjustments. To make sure we're not needlessly spinning the
CPU, the thread will sleep once it has reached its target, and will
be awoken when a new target volume is set.

title: Bluetooth activation support! Closes #5.
message:
Bluetooth activation support! Closes #5.

There are two implementations in use:
* One for 2.3 and below devices with an undocumented A2DP intent. Yikes!
* Another documented API for 3.0 devices and up.

message: Fix map sizes.

title: Add (inactive) bluetooth activation.
message:
Add (inactive) bluetooth activation.

Uses undocumented intents; not sure if I want to keep this.

Increase max_dist to 6000.

This compensates for the slower record rate of 1.5s (vs 1s).

title: Delete the old locations database on upgrade.

title: Add a replacement song/location tracker.
message:
Add a replacement song/location tracker.

This is ultimately a replacement for DatabaseManager, and fixes a few
issues with how that operated. It also allows for multiple routes, but
in 0.8 we'll initially ship with these disabled.

The code isn't active yet, either, and won't be until I strip out
DatabaseManager and some leftover activation stuff.
